name: BootstrapAngularAdminWebApp
description: Admin web application template with Bootstrap 3 and AngularJS.

scripts.releaseSandbox: git commit -a -m 'sandbox:latest';git tag -f release ;git push -u origin develop --tags --force
scripts.releaseProduction: git commit -a -m 'production:3.6';git tag -f release ;git push -u origin master --tags --force
scripts.releaseLocalProduction: git commit -a -m 'production:latest';git tag -f release ;git push -u origin master --tags --force
